content: जूर्णि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Swift, speedy, quick. {@--2@} Running, proceeding quickly. {@--3@} Praising, invoking. --र्णिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Speed. {@--2@} An epithet of Āditya or sun. {@--3@} The body. {@--4@} The Brahman ({%<ab>n.</ab>%}). {@--5@} Anger. {@--6@} A fiery weapon.
